#define DYNATRACE_API(api)   __DYNATRACE_API__(api)
 Defines the API for a sensor.
#define DYNATRACE_ENTER()   __DYNATRACE_ENTER__(0)
 Places a sensor.
#define DYNATRACE_START_PUREPATH()   __DYNATRACE_ENTER__(1)
 Places a sensor and marks it as entry point.
#define DYNATRACE_EXIT()   dynatrace_exit(__dynatrace_method_id__, __dynatrace_serial_no__)
 Marks the end of a sensor.
#define DYNATRACE_EXIT_EXCEPTION(message)   dynatrace_exit_exception(__dynatrace_method_id__, __dynatrace_serial_no__, message)
 Marks the end of a sensor by exception (this will change the PurePath state if the node is the top-most one of this PurePath).

Detailed Description

Placing Sensors. 

int baz(const char *bar) {
    DYNATRACE_API("BAZAPI");
    DYNATRACE_ENTER_CAPTURE(DYNATRACE_CAPTURE_STRING(bar));
    ...
    DYNATRACE_EXIT_RETURN_INT32(0);
}

void foo(const char *bar) {
    DYNATRACE_START_PUREPATH();
    baz(bar);
    DYNATRACE_EXIT();
}

Define Documentation

#define DYNATRACE_API ( api   )     __DYNATRACE_API__(api)

Defines the API for a sensor.

Remarks:
This has to be placed BEFORE entering a sensor.

 
#define DYNATRACE_ENTER (  )     __DYNATRACE_ENTER__(0)

Places a sensor.

See also:
DYNATRACE_START_PUREPATH for marking this as entry point.

 
#define DYNATRACE_START_PUREPATH (  )     __DYNATRACE_ENTER__(1)

Places a sensor and marks it as entry point.

See also:
DYNATRACE_ENTER for placing a sensor and NOT marking is as entry point.

 
#define DYNATRACE_EXIT (  )     dynatrace_exit(__dynatrace_method_id__, __dynatrace_serial_no__)

Marks the end of a sensor.

#define DYNATRACE_EXIT_EXCEPTION ( message   )     dynatrace_exit_exception(__dynatrace_method_id__, __dynatrace_serial_no__, message)

Marks the end of a sensor by exception (this will change the PurePath state if the node is the top-most one of this PurePath).
